modName: Dova s Angels - Iona - Jordis - Lydia - Mjoll - Saadia - Sylgja - Uthgerd - Dova s Aerin - Dova s Orcs Borgakh - Ugor - Urog - Lash
summary:
This mods the following NPCs: Iona, Jordis the Sword Maiden, Lydia, Mjoll the Lioness, Sylgja,  Uthgerd the Unbroken, Saadia, Borgakh the Steel Heart, Ugor, Urog, Lash gra-Dushnikh and Aerin

All followers are: 
set to essential
potential followers
potential marriage, except Aerin maybe
auto-level with PC with level 100 cap
have feminine ani
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/12885-1-1348036081.jpg[/img]
Dova\'s Angels V4 mods the following NPCs: Iona, Jordis the Sword Maiden, Lydia, Mjoll the Lioness, Sylgja, Uthgerd the Unbroken, and Saadia (she is a spellsword with elemental and healing spells).
[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/12885-2-1348036081.jpg[/img]
Dova\'s Orcs V1.2 mods Borgakh the Steel Heart, Ugor, Urog, and Lash gra-Dushnikh
[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/12885-3-1348036081.jpg[/img]
Dova\'s Aerin V1 mods Aerin, Mjolls BFF/stalker so you can make him a follower since he follows you around if you have Mjoll anyway.

All followers are: 
set to essential
potential followers
potential marriage
auto-level with PC
have feminine animations (except Aerin)
have Apache Hairs
have class appropriate combat, stealth and magic perks
Mjoll, Iona, Saadia, Ugor, and Urog have Mr. Lenski\'s lace warpaints replacers, can be found on the Coverwomen page. http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/download.php?id=17222
(For warpaints), Mr. Lenski\'s lace warpaints (I deleted the new lip tintmasks that come with the lace warpaints, re-Rar\'d the files and then installed)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/download.php?id=17222

Required Mod to use this:

ApachiiSkyHair by Apachii (both  ApachiiSkyHair_v_1_4_Full and  ApachiiSkyHairFemale_v1_0)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10168

(for Saadia, you might/probably need) Use All The Hair Styles by ClarkWasHere
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11282

Even though Borgakh, Ugor, Urog, and Lash are set to have the female animations, they will still have male animations, unless you use one of the following mods, which will fix the issue with everyone but Lash(maybe because she isn\'t a stronghold orc, I don\'t know):  
Female Orc And Followers walk and animations fix by chaosknight19
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9655
Female Orc Walk Only 
or	
Feminine Female Orcs by Kataous
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16392

Optional Files

There are also no warpaint versions of Dova\'s Angels V4 and Dova\'s Orcs V1.2 that removes warpaint from Mjoll, Iona, Saadia, Borgakh, Ugor, and Urog.


Miscellaneous Files

[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/12885-4-1348036082.jpg[/img]
I upped a revised Maurinth from Unique Followers by Sokkvabekk http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22438. I gave her a different hairdo, freckles, and made her chin slightly longer. She\'s also set to essential, potential marriage, auto-level with PC with level 100 cap, and gave her class appropriate perks.

I also upped Anya, Brinna, Cosette, Isobel, and Lola from Unique Followers by Sokkvabekk http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22438. All are set to essential, potential marriage, auto-level with PC with level 100 cap, have class appropriate perks and spells. However there is no cosmetic changes to these, they are original appearance.

I did take away the chain lightning from mages because it causes so much friendly fire, and I took away incinerate, ice spear, and thunderbolt just to nerf them. If you want them to deal that much damage you can always teach them the spell using UFO or console commands.   I also got rid of conjuration spells because I don\'t like atronauchs.

If you get these revised versions of the Unique Followers here make sure you hit up Sokkvabekk\'s page at http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22438 and show some love there. Sokkvabekk is the artist behind these beauties, I just added some functionality. 
[img]http://i.imgur.com/uAq27.jpg[/img]


Very cool follower mods that work with this set up:
	
UFO - Ultimate Follower Overhaul by fLokii
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14037
	
Move it Dammit for NPC Companions and Followers by Apogee777
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4020

Spouses Can Live Everywhere by Amgepo and Emma
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11370
	
My Home Is Your Home - a mod for followers by Volek
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18045

Spouse Store Mod by Risuun
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12325

Followers can Relax by King Coin (made redundant by UFO)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9504

Ask Follower Skills by melbourne47
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10675

Bathing Beauties or Beefcake - Luxury Suite by Migal (allows you to ask your followers to see their stat sheet, their perks, or their spells, so even if you never use the player house it adds the added functionality is worth it)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11427


Installation 

Use Nexus Mod Manager - easiest

or extract into .../Elder Scrolls V Skyrim/Data folder.


This mod was made with Skyrim NPC Editor 0_75_1 by Foretrenty
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4554


Appearance mods used in screenshots:

DIMONIZED UNP female body by dimon99
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6709

CBBE skin texture V2 V3 plus Thepal and UNP compatible by navetsea
Female Face skin v1_8 rev1 Fuller Lips with makeup PATCH
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6554

ApachiiSkyHair by Apachii
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10168
	
The Eyes Of Beauty by Gabriel Mailhot
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13722
	
Improved Freckles Skyrim by missjennabee
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16147
	
HQ Eyebrows - vanilla texture replacers by Regn
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21451
	
HQ Beards - vanilla texture replacers by Regn
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21620

(For warpaints), Mr. Lenski\'s lace warpaints (I deleted the new lip tintmasks that come with the lace warpaints, re-Rar\'d the files and then installed)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/download.php?id=17222

Armor mods used in screenshots:
	
aMidianBorn steel plate armor by CaBaL
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20792

aMidianBorn steel armor by CaBaL
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18272

aMidianBorn Leather Armor by CaBaL
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22065
	
Immersive Armors by hothtrooper44
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19733
	
Blades Armor Red version And the black version by dabo
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/5481

My Other Mods

Nightingale Retex - Black Sacrament Prime - Ninja Armor by Gambit77-Amethyst_Deceiver-Satyr_Zerofrost
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7025
author: Gambit77

files.changelogHtml: I've cleaned these all up with TES5Edit and have gotten rid of all the recipes for clothing, armor and weapons, and I've also gotten rid of the extra instances of Apachi hairs except for one of each of the seven used.
